Name: Basket carrier
Description: This figurine in terracotta depicts a nude woman, standing on  an oval base. On her head she carries a basket of fruits in which a uraeus crowned by a solar disk rears up. On her right, a child plays the double flute; on her left, another plays the tambourine. It is probably a priestess or an acolyte who carries in procession the emblems of the cult of the goddess Isis or objects intended as offerings.
